name: Mizue
description:
Mizue: a beautiful, water-side city buckling under its ever-expanding populace.

You explore the small, closed-off neighbourhood as 'Sanjee', doing odd tasks for some of its unique cast of inhabitants. With its colourful architecture and nice vistas to see, Sanjee enjoys taking in the sights of Mizue every day!
An environment I created for a university project. It has a dialogue system for the tasks and some story, but its true strength is in the creative and stunning visuals (and where all the marks were)!
The fps movement system is not mine ("fps drifter", free on the Unity Store). It is a little clunky when going up ramps and also running into walls! 

If you want to see more, visit my Artstation:
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/w6q0w9

Controls:
WASD - Movement
Space - Jump
LMB - Skip Dialogue

Additional Controls:
Scroll Wheel - Zoom in and Out
F1 - Screenshot (Shots located in ".../Mizue/Mizue_Data/Screenshots")
